```{r echo=FALSE}
  message = FALSE

```

An ftp client for R

**not quite ready to use yet**

## Installation

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("ropensci/ftp")
```

```{r}
library('ftp')
```

## list files

```{r}
url <- "ftp://ftp.ncdc.noaa.gov/pub/data/noaa/2014/"
list_files(url)[1:10]
```

## ftp client

```{r}
(x <- ftp("ftp://ftp.ncdc.noaa.gov/pub/data/ghcn/"))
x$pwd()
```
